Model¶

Network structure documentation

High level model¶

class neuron_visualization_addon.model.Network.Network(id)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class represents a network. Network consists of populations and projections between them.

animateSpikes(spikes)[source]¶

Animate network.

Parameters:spikes (dict) – Dictionary of cell IDs as keys and a tuple of time and intensity as values
highlightPopulation(population_id)[source]¶

Highlights a population with a random color.

Parameters:population_id (string) – The population ID.
highlightPopulationsAll()[source]¶

Highlights all populations with random colors.

pullProjections(populationID_1, populationID_2)[source]¶

Pull projections between two populations.

Parameters:
  • populationID_1 (string) – First population ID
  • populationID_2 (string) – Second population ID
pullProjectionsAll()[source]¶

Pulls all projections to the center of their mass.

removeHighlightAll()[source]¶

Removes highlight from all populations.

class neuron_visualization_addon.model.Population.Population(id, size, cell_type)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class represents a population of brain cells in the network

cellSpike(id)[source]¶

Set a specific cell to spike.

Parameters:id (string) – Cell ID
location¶

Location of the center of mass.

pullTogether()[source]¶

Pull cells towards the center of mass.

removeColor()[source]¶

Remove coloring from the population.

setColor(color=(0.0, 0.0, 0.0))[source]¶

Set RGB color to the whole population

Parameters:color (tuple) – RGB color
class neuron_visualization_addon.model.Cell.Cell(id, location=(0, 0, 0))[source]¶

Bases: object

This class represents a brain cell in the network

drawAxon(weight, destinationCell)[source]¶

Draw an axon between this cell and destination cell.

Parameters:
  • weight (float) – The weight of a connection.
  • destinationCell (Cell) – Projection destionation cell.
Returns:

Projection – Created projection
isProjectedTo(projection)[source]¶

Add projections from which the input is received.

Parameters:projection (Projection) – Projection to be added
location¶

Location of the cell.

setColor(color=(0.0, 0.0, 0.0))[source]¶

Set RGB color

Parameters:color (tuple) – RGB color
setSpikes(spikes, colorMap='jet')[source]¶

Set cell to spike at a time with a specific intensity

Parameters:
  • spikes (array) – Array with times is ms and spike intensities
  • colorMap (string) – Color map for intensities Visualization
class neuron_visualization_addon.model.Projection.Projection(parent_object)[source]¶

Bases: object

This class represents a projection between neurons in the network

destination¶

Destination of the projection (receiving soma)

makeProjection(weight, projection)[source]¶

Make projection from defined bezier curve.

Parameters:
  • weight (array) – Weight of the connection
  • projection – Array of bezier points
makeSimpleProjection(weight, destination)[source]¶

Make simple projection: straight line between parent object and destination object.

Parameters:
  • weight (float) – Weight of the connection
  • weight – Weight of the connection
middle¶

Middle of the projection

pullCenterTo(destination)[source]¶

Pull center of the projection to a specific position

Parameters:destination – Where to pull project to
setColor(color=(0.0, 0.0, 0.0))[source]¶

Set RGB color.

Parameters:color (tuple) – RGB color
start¶

Start of the projection (soma).

updateProjectionCurve(projection_points)[source]¶

Updates projection curve (axon).

Parameters:projection_points (array) – Array of points that define a bezier curve
updateTaperCurve(taper_points)[source]¶

Updates taper curve (shape curve).

Parameters:taper_points (array) – Array of points that define a bezier curve

Parameters:
  • intensity (float) – Firing intensity between 0 and 1
  • colorMap (string) – color map
Returns:

tuple – rgb color
